Aelo/Ocipite

Aleo used her wing to protect herself of Mosquitor's acyd and it 
started to burn her wing, she moved with pain and like a mirror 
Ocipite did the same. The combined attacked of Mosquitor, Zardus, 
Hurricane was enough to Aelo, who fell in stasis lock.

Ocipite avoided most of the shots of Wheeljack and Hurricane's 
Lightning bolt when she saw Aelo fell in stasis lock she knew that 
she was lost; she started to look a round searching a exit... but she 
was surrounded by enemies.

Just a thing could help her, she started to absorb the limited energy 
that the ship could have... her eyes started to get a pale blue 
shine... When she tought that she has enough she shot the energy, 
doing that computer's screen started to brake, and the lights turned 
off.

Ocipite know that it was a small chance, she ran towards the exit 
avoiding Mosquitor and the acyd that was in the floor. SHe left the 
room and lost inside the ship.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> 
> ::Wheeljack dodges a few of the shots, but gets hit by most. he 
fires 12 
> shots at Aelo and 12 at Ocipite::
> ~~~~~
> Hurricane: Oh, you want a piece of me? Well im down with that.
> ::he fires 4 ligthning bolts from one horn at Ocipite and 4 bolts 
from his 
> other horn at Aelo::
> Hurricane: Thats what Im talking about!
